name: Firefox OSX back/forward buttons like safari
description:
Applies to about:addons & about:preferences as well.

Only has an effect when using "icons" & "use small icons" in toolbar customization!

Tested on Firefox 13 & 15 on OSX. Does not work on Windows!

Other styles from user 142430.
